testsuite.name: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Lesson with Submit"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: When I click on the Properties tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I enable the option "Allow Submit"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I save & close the lesson on the properties page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the lesson with warning text "WARNING: Empty section"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: When I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I click the breadcrumb to return to the class homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: And I click on the "Lesson with Submit" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: Then the module "Lesson with Submit" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: Then I see the "Submit Lesson" button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present

testsuite.system-out: @Lesson @LessonEditor Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson ?[90m# ManageLesson.feature:11?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI add new section "?[0m?[32m?[1mSection 1?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.addNewSection(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32ma new section "?[0m?[32m?[1mSection 1?[0m?[32m" appears in the navigation?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.assertNewSectionVisible(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI add new page "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 1?[0m?[32m" from the section drop down?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.addNewPageFromSectionDropDown(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI add new page "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 2 as Block?[0m?[32m" from the section drop down and display blocks as separate pages?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.addNewPageFromSectionDropDownAsBlock(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32ma new page "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 1?[0m?[32m" appears in the navigation?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.assertNewPageVisible(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32ma new page "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 2 as Block?[0m?[32m" appears in the navigation and displayed as separate page?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.assertNewPageVisibleAsBlock(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI rename the name of the section to "?[0m?[32m?[1mSection 1 Renamed?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.renameSectionName(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe new name of the section "?[0m?[32m?[1mSection 1 Renamed?[0m?[32m" appears in the navigation?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.assertNewSectionNameVisible(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI rename the name of the page to "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 1 Renamed?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.renamePageName(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe new name of the page "?[0m?[32m?[1mPage 1 Renamed?[0m?[32m" appears in the navigation?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.assertNewPageNameVisible(String)?[0m
